name: Carnimelles
description:
Survive the animals' revolution on estinguishing the meat industry!

Play a steak fleeing from humans trying to eat you!

Gain rewards and satisfy the animals to gain power!

Rebuild the animal farm!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game from a carnivore for carnivores

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made with Godot Engine within 48h for mizjam 1 with music from https://opengameart.org/ (CC0) and https://fontlibrary.org/ (OFL)
